channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass is overgrown again, 25th September
item.description:
The grass was last cut 19 August 2025, 5 weeks ago which really is far too infrequent. Please cut it ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merrick Square, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins not collected this week, 25th September

item.title: Weeds and redundant signs, 25th September
item.description:
As per earlier post - the section of Dalberg Road between Mervan Road and Jeff Road has not been weeded all summer, and this looks very unkempt. The parking signs from the May festivals are still fixed to the lampposts.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dalberg Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hazard for pedestrians. Not able to see if car coming., 25th September
item.description:
Overgrown bushes along the sidewalk are blocking the view of oncoming cars, making it difficult for pedestrians to see approaching traffic and for drivers to spot people crossing. This situation poses a serious risk, especially for children and anyone with limited mobility. Please address this as soon as possible by trimming the vegetation to restore a clear line of sight.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lakeside Avenue, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping again same place same person, 25th September
item.description:
NO DOUBT AGAIN - TWICE IN A WEEK SAME PERSON Please do not use our council tax for that kind of person. They should be fined ALWAYS THE SAME PERSON - In front of their flat NO SHAME Council, please act and must issue fines

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Londesborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blanket draped over railings., 25th September
item.description:
Someone has draped a blanket/duvet over the railings outside our building. Please remove as soon as possible as it makes the place look unkept. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Titchfield Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uber/lime bikes, 25th September
item.description:
There are only meant to be about 10 bicycles left at any one time in the dock. This afternoon they’ve filled them so that they are blocking the pavements, the road and parking bays. Nuisance to emergency services too as well as disabled people.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cavendish Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Contractor has not replaced the bricks, 25th September
item.description:
The contractor has finished the work at the junction of Poolman St and Timber Pond Rd. They have laid tarmac and not put the bricks back. This is unacceptable. Please ensure the contractor returns and returns the road to its former state.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Poolmans Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet
